rusty-sword.name: Rusty Sword
rusty-sword.description: An old sword, covered in rust but still sharp enough to be useful.
rusty-sword.description_zh: 一把老舊的劍，佈滿鏽跡但仍然鋒利到足以使用。

ancient-torch.name: Ancient Torch
ancient-torch.description: A torch that flickers with an eternal flame.
ancient-torch.description_zh: 一支閃爍著永恆火焰的火炬。

health-potion.name: Health Potion
health-potion.description: A red potion that smells of herbs. It looks like it could restore health.
health-potion.description_zh: 一瓶散發草藥香味的紅色藥水。看起來可以恢復生命值。

golden-key.name: Golden Key
golden-key.description: A ornate golden key. It must unlock something important.
golden-key.description_zh: 一把精美的黃金鑰匙。它一定能打開某個重要的東西。

magic-gem.name: Magic Gem
magic-gem.description: A glowing gemstone that pulses with magical energy.
magic-gem.description_zh: 一顆散發著魔法能量脈動光芒的寶石。

legendary-sword.name: Legendary Sword
legendary-sword.description: A magnificent blade forged by ancient masters. Its edge gleams with otherworldly power.
legendary-sword.description_zh: 一把由遠古大師鍛造的華麗之劍。劍鋒閃耀著超凡的力量。
